sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app>

      <Navbar
        :activePlatform="activePlatform"
        :user="user"
        />
      <v-container style="width: 1012px; height: 100%" class="teal lighten-5">
          <router-view
            :key="$route.fullPath"
            @platform-activated="setActivePlatform($event)"/>
        </v-container>
    </v-app>
</template>

<script type="text/javascript">
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js"
import Navbar from "@/components/Navbar.vue"

  export default {
    name: "App",
    data() {
      return {
        // activeScenario: {},
        activePlatform: {},
        user: {},
      }
    },
    components: {
      Navbar
    },
    methods: {
      async setUserInfo() {
        const data = await apiService("/api/user/");
        const requestUser = data.results[0]["email"];
        this.user = data.results[0]
        window.localStorage.setItem("email", requestUser)
      },
      // setActiveScenario(scenario){
      //   if (this.activePlatform.id == null) {
      //     this.activeScenario = scenario;
      //   }
      // },
      setHome(scenario){
        this.activeScenario = scenario;
      },
      setActivePlatform(platform){
        this.activePlatform = platform;
      }
    },
    created() {
      this.setUserInfo();
    }
  }
</script>
